data.text:
“WINNING DREAM STAGE” ― The student council convened that day to 
discuss the upcoming live concert to commemorate the 
establishment of the world of Uma Musume.
data.processed:
<story>“WINNING DREAM STAGE” ― The student council convened that day to 
<story>discuss the upcoming live concert to commemorate the 
<story>establishment of the world of Uma Musume.

data.text:
…That concludes the agenda 
for the anniversary live concert.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>…That concludes the agenda 
<story>for the anniversary live concert.

data.text:
Thank you, Air Groove. With that, our meeting is concluded… 
Oh, it seems as though the curtain of night has already fallen.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Thank you, Air Groove. With that, our meeting is concluded… 
<story>Oh, it seems as though the curtain of night has already fallen.

data.text:
…I'm so hungry. 
This meeting took way too long.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>…I'm so hungry. 
<story>This meeting took way too long.

data.text:
Brian! What's with your attitude!? You're the vice president, so 
you should understand the importance and significance of this 
anniversary live concert…!
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>Brian! What's with your attitude!? You're the vice president, so 
<story>you should understand the importance and significance of this 
<story>anniversary live concert…!

data.text:
Well… Brian, I understand 
that things will get busy. Hmm, maybe we should 
come up with a solution for…
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Well… Brian, I understand 
<story>that things will get busy. Hmm, maybe we should 
<story>come up with a solution for…

data.text:
Howdy!! Air Groove!! 
We're here to lend y'all a helping hand!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Howdy!! Air Groove!! 
<story>We're here to lend y'all a helping hand!!

data.text:
Brian is such a stubborn person! 
If you need Maya's help, I'll finish it in a flash♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Brian is such a stubborn person! 
<story>If you need Maya's help, I'll finish it in a flash♪

data.text:
Rudolf, is there anything that I can do to help with 
the anniversary live concert?…Everyone seems so 
excited for it… So I'd like to help.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Rudolf, is there anything that I can do to help with 
<story>the anniversary live concert?…Everyone seems so 
<story>excited for it… So I'd like to help.

data.text:
Girls…! Heh… Hahaha! 
The future's looking bright! Our path forward is clear!
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Girls…! Heh… Hahaha! 
<story>The future's looking bright! Our path forward is clear!

data.text:
Everyone, thank you. Let's work together and push forward to make 
sure the anniversary live concert goes off without a hitch!
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Everyone, thank you. Let's work together and push forward to make 
<story>sure the anniversary live concert goes off without a hitch!
